TEXT.TITLE: ALBERTSON'S <ABS> TO INCREASE NEW STORE OPENINGS
TEXT.BODY: Albertson's said it plans to open 33 to 35 new stores during 1987 and remodel about 20-25 stores. This compares to 21 new store openings in 1986 and 17 remodelings. Albertson's, a grocery chain, said total capital expenditures for these projects will be in excess of 200 mln dlrs in 1987. Reuter
